pages.text: When the last light fades, The Heart will call out for help in the server chat! Rush to her aid, or it may be too late.$(br2)When The Heart dies, she dies... and with her, the daily login coins cease as well.
Life is full of release and renewal, and The Heart has died before!$(br2)$(l:patchouli:economy/heart_revive)Next Chapter$(/l).
